verses.text: To you who dwell in heaven have I lifted up my eyes.

Behold, as the eyes of servants are directedto the hands of their masters, andas the eyes of a maidservant to the hands of her mistress; so our eyes are directedto the Lord our God, until he have mercy upon us.
Have pity upon us, O Lord, have pity upon us: for we are exceedingly filled with contempt.
Yes, our soul has been exceedingly filled with it: letthe reproach beto them that are at ease, and contempt to the proud.
